## read cnv file:

```{r cars}
df <- read.cnv.file("example data/V0001F01.cnv")

head(df)
```

## Plot


```{r pressure, echo=FALSE, fig.width=12, fig.height=4}
library("reshape2")
melted.df <- melt(df,
                  id.vars = c("depSM", "scan", "nbin",
                              "flag", "timeS", "nbf",
                              "altM", "prDM"))

library("ggplot2")
ggplot(melted.df,
       aes(x = depSM, y = value)) +
    geom_line() +
    scale_x_reverse() +
    coord_flip() +
    facet_grid(.~variable, scales = "free") +
    theme_bw() +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
```
